member.name: URLASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS
member.summary: The URLASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS enumerated values are used with to determine how it executes.

member.name: URLASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS.URLASSOCDLG_FL_USE_DEFAULT_NAME
member.summary: Use the default file name (that is, "Internet Shortcut").

member.name: URLASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS.URLASSOCDLG_FL_REGISTER_ASSOC
member.summary: Register the selected application as the handler for the protocol specified in the pcszURL parameter of . The application is registered only if this flag is set and the user indicates that a persistent association is desired.
